divs: Sighting Details Looking out the kitchens north window, a VERYbright star caught my attention. Brighter than brightest planet I everobserved. As I was watching it, it receded northward and dimmed rapidly anddisappeared. Maximum duration ten seconds. It travelled faster than a plane,but was DEFINITELY not a shooting star.
Summary: Object, brighter than brightest star, receded in 1
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rosthern
This sighting has never been favorited.
